parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post contains "CMF: 11240002" at the end, indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly mentions Alina Gorghiu and her role as a future deputy, directly linking her to the PNL party and the parliamentary elections.  It uses the phrase "votați echipa PNL" (vote for the PNL team), clearly advocating for a specific political party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The use of hashtags and the general message suggest an attempt to reach a broad segment of the population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to support Alina Gorghiu and the PNL party in the upcoming parliamentary elections. The call to action ("Duminică, votați echipa PNL!") directly aims to influence voting behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It's not presenting objective information but rather promoting a specific candidate and party.  The focus is on persuasion, not unbiased information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct appeal for votes, presented as a campaign message.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>561393536849758</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, with ad archive ID 561393536849758, fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Alina Gorghiu) and her party (PNL), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the "Duminică" reference to election day), has a clear electoral objective (to garner votes), and surpasses the boundaries of journalistic reporting by explicitly advocating for a specific candidate and party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's paid nature and broad reach on Facebook solidify its intention to influence voters.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Alina Gorghiu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Alina Gorghiu, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook cu ID-ul 561393536849758, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea, care a costat între 600 și 699 RON,  se referă direct la candidata Alina Gorghiu și la PNL, îndemnând la vot cu fraza "Duminică, votați echipa PNL!", având un efect electoral clar pozitiv pentru candidată. Prezența codului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura sa de material de propagandă electorală.  Postarea, vizibilă pe Facebook, a atins între 90.000 și 100.000 de impresii, conform datelor din Ad Library,  și a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000-500.000 de persoane.  Informațiile de contact ale candidatei sunt disponibile public: senator@alinagorghiu.ro și +40765055855.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
